meanings.definition: A person who makes a bet or wager.
meanings.sent1: The wagerers at the horse race were excited to see who would win.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends were all wagerers, placing bets on their favorite sports teams.
meanings.sent3: The wagerers at the poker table were all trying to outsmart each other with their bets.
meanings.sent4: In the world of finance, successful investors are like skilled wagerers, taking calculated risks.
meanings.sent5: The seasoned wagerers knew when to bet big and when to play it safe.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in gambling or betting activities.
meanings.sent1: The casino was full of eager wagerers hoping to strike it lucky.
meanings.sent2: During the game night, the wagerers were all in good spirits, enjoying the thrill of betting.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends were such frequent wagerers that they had a special poker night every week.
meanings.sent4: The stock market can be a risky place for inexperienced wagerers to test their luck.
meanings.sent5: The seasoned wagerers knew when to walk away and when to keep playing.
